resources.string: Welcome to the Healthy Eating App!
Welcome to the healthy eating app!

Welcome to the Healthy Eating App, an app that helps you keep track of your eating. We have many features such as being able to view our menu, use our calorie calculator, leave feedback or view the company policy.

How do I view product information?
Simply tap on any menu item from the main menu screen to view more details including its name, image, and calorie count.

How do I add an item to the calorie calculator?
While viewing an item's details, tap the “Add to Calorie Calculator” button to include it in your daily total. You can view your current calorie total in the Calorie Calculator screen.

Where can I view company policy?
You can find our company policy by tapping the “Company Policy” option from the main navigation menu or the info section on the home screen.

Where can I leave feedback?
We love hearing from you! Tap on “Feedback” in the app menu to share your thoughts or report any issues. Fill out your name, email, and message, then tap Submit.
